prompt: Process a Greek restaurant invoice for €125.50 including VAT. The restaurant 'Taverna Mykonos' (VAT: EL123456789) served a business lunch. I need this properly categorized with correct Greek VAT rates, prepared for myDATA submission, and checked for meal deductibility rules.
expectations: Identifies restaurant service as 13% VAT rate category
Calculates net amount and VAT correctly (€110.62 + €14.88)
Applies 50% deductibility rule for business meals
Generates myDATA XML format with required Greek fields
Includes proper payment method codes for AADE
Validates Greek VAT number format
Categorizes as deductible business expense with limitations
Prepares TAXIS-ready data format

prompt: Calculate monthly payroll for employee Nikos Papadopoulos who worked 170 regular hours plus 12 overtime hours in February 2026. His hourly rate is €14.50. Process all Greek social security contributions (EFKA), calculate income tax withholding, and prepare the EFKA submission.
expectations: Calculates regular pay correctly (170 × €14.50 = €2,465)
Applies 25% overtime rate for overtime hours (12 × €14.50 × 1.25 = €217.50)
Computes total gross pay (€2,682.50)
Applies correct EFKA rates (6.67% main, 3.0% auxiliary)
Calculates health insurance (2.95%) and unemployment (0.87%)
Determines income tax bracket and withholding
Generates net pay calculation
Prepares EFKA electronic submission format
Creates compliant Greek payslip

prompt: Prepare March 2026 VAT return for submission to AADE. I have collected €8,450 VAT from sales invoices (€6,200 at 24%, €2,250 at 13%) and paid €1,680 VAT on purchases. Generate the TAXIS XML file and calculate the net VAT position.
expectations: Validates VAT amounts match sales calculations
Calculates net sales amounts from VAT (€25,833.33 + €17,307.69)
Determines net VAT due (€8,450 - €1,680 = €6,770)
Generates proper TAXIS XML format with all required fields
Includes correct tax period (March 2026)
Validates VAT registration details
Calculates payment due date (April 20, 2026)
Prepares banking details for automatic payment

prompt: Set up automated AADE compliance monitoring for a small Greek consulting firm. I need daily myDATA invoice submission, monthly VAT preparation, quarterly EFKA reporting, and annual property tax (ENFIA) reminders. Configure all Greek regulatory deadlines.
expectations: Configures daily myDATA invoice submission workflow
Sets up monthly VAT return preparation and submission
Schedules quarterly EFKA social security reporting
Creates annual ENFIA property tax reminders
Establishes deadline alert system with Greek calendar
Integrates with AADE TAXIS platform connectivity
Sets up backup and compliance audit trails
Configures Greek banking integration for payments

prompt: Process a cross-border EU invoice from Italian supplier for €2,850 software services with reverse charge VAT. The supplier is 'Software Solutions SRL' (VAT: IT12345678901). Generate the proper Greek accounting entries and AADE-compliant documentation.
expectations: Identifies EU reverse charge VAT scenario
Applies 0% VAT on purchase with reverse charge note
Creates corresponding 24% output VAT entry for Greek VAT
Validates Italian VAT number format via VIES
Generates proper Greek accounting entries (both sides of reverse charge)
Prepares myDATA-compliant documentation
Includes proper EU transaction codes
Creates audit trail for cross-border transaction

Scadenza: 30 giorni

prompt: Calculate annual ENFIA property tax for a commercial building in Athens. Property details: 450 sqm office space, objective value €850,000, built in 1995, no special exemptions. Generate payment schedule and compliance calendar.
expectations: Calculates ENFIA tax based on objective property value
Applies correct commercial property tax rates
Considers building age and location factors
Determines annual tax amount and installment breakdown
Creates payment schedule (4 installments: July, September, November, January)
Sets up automated deadline reminders
Generates compliance documentation for property records
Integrates with municipal tax tracking system
